text: Sano ŵachaweje mwa jenumanja ni kulekaga achiŵammakwao, aleche wasiya wakwamba achiŵammakwaowo wanti apedwe ichindu yakwakamuchisya yakwana chaka chantundu mwangali koposyedwa (mmajumba ga achiŵammakwao), nambo naga akukopoka (achimisyene), chipaŵe pangali ulemwa kukwenu mu ichindu yalitendele achimisyene yakwilanila (ni malamusi ga Dini), sano Allah ni Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
